description: Situated on the Naviglio away from Milan’s bustling nightlife, this rustic-style restaurant is decorated with a profusion of wood. As the name suggests, fish and seafood take pride of place on the menu, with a good choice of antipasti to whet the appetite, as well as inviting trays of raw fish dishes (shared by the whole table), followed by delicious traditional pasta and grilled options.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
